00109 //XXX note: sizeof(cMessage) could be made a little smaller: the fields created, frommod, fromgate are rarely used by models (note: sendtime and tstamp *do* get used in practice)
00110 class SIM_API cMessage : public cOwnedObject
00111 {
00112     friend class cMessageHeap;
00113 
00114   private:
00115     // note: fields are in an order that maximizes packing (minimizes sizeof(cMessage))
00116     short msgkind;             // message kind -- 0>= user-defined meaning, <0 reserved
00117     short prior;               // priority -- used for scheduling msgs with equal times
00118     short srcprocid;           // reserved for use by parallel execution: id of source partition
00119     cArray *parlistp;          // ptr to list of parameters
00120     cObject *ctrlp;            // ptr to "control info"
00121     void *contextptr;          // a stored pointer -- user-defined meaning, used with self-messages
00122 
00123     int frommod, fromgate;     // source module and gate IDs -- set internally
00124     int tomod, togate;         // dest. module and gate IDs -- set internally
00125     simtime_t created;         // creation time -- set be constructor
00126     simtime_t sent,delivd;     // time of sending & delivery -- set internally
00127     simtime_t tstamp;          // time stamp -- user-defined meaning
00128 
00129     int heapindex;             // used by cMessageHeap (-1 if not on heap; all other values, including negative ones, means "on the heap")
00130     unsigned long insertordr;  // used by cMessageHeap
00131 
00132     eventnumber_t prev_event_num; // event number of the sending/scheduling this message
00133 
00134     long msgid;                // a unique message identifier assigned upon message creation
00135     long msgtreeid;            // a message identifier that is inherited by dup, if non dupped it is msgid
00136     static long next_id;       // the next unique message identifier to be assigned upon message creation
00137 
00138     // global variables for statistics
00139     static long total_msgs;
00140     static long live_msgs;
00141 
00142   private:
00143     // internal: create parlist
00144     void _createparlist();
00145 
00146   public:
00147     // internal: returns the event number which scheduled this event, or the event in which
00148     // this message was last delivered to a module. Stored for recording into the event log file.
00149     eventnumber_t getPreviousEventNumber() const {return prev_event_num;}
00150 
00151     // internal: sets previousEventNumber.
00152     void setPreviousEventNumber(eventnumber_t num) {prev_event_num = num;}
00153 
00154     // internal: used by cMessageHeap.
00155     unsigned long getInsertOrder() const {return insertordr;}
00156 
00157     // internal: called by the simulation kernel as part of the send(),
00158     // scheduleAt() calls to set the values returned by the
00159     // getSenderModuleId(), getSenderGate(), getSendingTime() methods.
00160     void setSentFrom(cModule *module, int gateId, simtime_t_cref t);
00161 
00162     // internal: called by the simulation kernel as part of processing
00163     // the send(), scheduleAt() calls to set the values returned
00164     // by the getArrivalModuleId(), getArrivalGate() methods.
00165     void setArrival(cModule *module, int gateId);
00166 
00167     // internal: called by the simulation kernel as part of processing
00168     // the send(), scheduleAt() calls to set the values returned
00169     // by the getArrivalModuleId(), getArrivalGate(), getArrivalTime() methods.
00170     void setArrival(cModule *module, int gate, simtime_t_cref t);
00171 
00172     // internal: called by the simulation kernel to set the value returned
00173     // by the getArrivalTime() method
00174     void setArrivalTime(simtime_t t);
00175 
00176     // internal: used by the parallel simulation kernel.
00177     void setSrcProcId(int procId) {srcprocid = (short)procId;}
00178 
00179     // internal: used by the parallel simulation kernel.
00180     int getSrcProcId() const {return srcprocid;}
00181 
00182   public:
00185 
00189     cMessage(const cMessage& msg);
00190 
00194     explicit cMessage(const char *name=NULL, short kind=0);
00195 
00199     virtual ~cMessage();
00200 
00205     cMessage& operator=(const cMessage& msg);
00207 
00212     virtual bool isPacket() const {return false;}

00228 
00233     virtual std::string detailedInfo() const;

00240 
00246     virtual void parsimPack(cCommBuffer *buffer);
00247 
00253     virtual void parsimUnpack(cCommBuffer *buffer);
00255 
00258 
00264     void setKind(short k)  {msgkind=k;}
00265 
00271     void setSchedulingPriority(short p)  {prior=p;}
00272 
00276     void setTimestamp() {tstamp=simulation.getSimTime();}
00277 
00281     void setTimestamp(simtime_t t) {tstamp=t;}
00282 
00291     void setContextPointer(void *p) {contextptr=p;}
00292 
00308     void setControlInfo(cObject *p);
00309 
00315     cObject *removeControlInfo();
00316 
00320     short getKind() const  {return msgkind;}
00321 
00325     short getSchedulingPriority() const  {return prior;}
00326 
00330     simtime_t_cref getTimestamp() const {return tstamp;}
00331 
00335     void *getContextPointer() const {return contextptr;}
00336 
00340     cObject *getControlInfo() const {return ctrlp;}
00342 
00345 
00359     virtual cArray& getParList()  {if (!parlistp) _createparlist(); return *parlistp;}
00360 
00371     virtual cMsgPar& addPar(const char *s)  {cMsgPar *p=new cMsgPar(s);getParList().add(p);return *p;}
00372 
00382     virtual cMsgPar& addPar(cMsgPar *p)  {getParList().add(p); return *p;}
00383 
00387     _OPPDEPRECATED cMsgPar& addPar(cMsgPar& p)  {return addPar(&p);}
00388 
00400     virtual cMsgPar& par(int n);
00401 
00414     virtual cMsgPar& par(const char *s);
00415 
00426     virtual int findPar(const char *s) const;
00427 
00438     virtual bool hasPar(const char *s) const {return findPar(s)>=0;}
00439 
00449     virtual cObject *addObject(cObject *p)  {getParList().add(p); return p;}
00450 
00461     virtual cObject *getObject(const char *s)  {return getParList().get(s);}
00462 
00472     virtual bool hasObject(const char *s)  {return !parlistp ? false : parlistp->find(s)>=0;}
00473 
00484     virtual cObject *removeObject(const char *s)  {return getParList().remove(s);}
00485 
00496     virtual cObject *removeObject(cObject *p)  {return getParList().remove(p);}
00498 
00501 
00505     bool isSelfMessage() const {return togate==-1;}
00506 
00510     bool isScheduled() const {return heapindex!=-1;}
00511 
00517     cModule *getSenderModule() const {return simulation.getModule(frommod);}
00518 
00524     cGate *getSenderGate() const;
00525 
00531     cModule *getArrivalModule() const {return simulation.getModule(tomod);}
00532 
00538     cGate *getArrivalGate() const;
00539 
00544     int getSenderModuleId() const {return frommod;}
00545 
00550     int getSenderGateId() const   {return fromgate;}
00551 
00556     int getArrivalModuleId() const {return tomod;}
00557 
00562     int getArrivalGateId() const  {return togate;}
00563 
00567     simtime_t_cref getCreationTime() const {return created;}
00568 
00573     simtime_t_cref getSendingTime()  const {return sent;}
00574 
00589     simtime_t_cref getArrivalTime()  const {return delivd;}
00590 
00594     bool arrivedOn(int gateId) const {return gateId==togate;}
00595 
00601     bool arrivedOn(const char *gatename) const;
00602 
00607     bool arrivedOn(const char *gatename, int gateindex) const;
00608 
00612     long getId() const {return msgid;}
00613 
00618     long getTreeId() const {return msgtreeid;}
00620 
00623 
00629     virtual const char *getDisplayString() const;
00631 
00642     static long getTotalMessageCount() {return total_msgs;}
00643 
00651     static long getLiveMessageCount() {return live_msgs;}
00652 
00656     static void resetMessageCounters()  {total_msgs=live_msgs=0;}
00658 };

00688 class SIM_API cPacket : public cMessage
00689 {
00690   private:
00691     enum {
00692         FL_ISRECEPTIONSTART = 4,
00693         FL_BITERROR = 8,
00694     };
00695     int64 len;            // length of the packet in bits -- used for bit error and transmission delay modeling
00696     simtime_t duration;   // transmission duration on last channel with datarate
00697     cPacket *encapmsg;    // ptr to the encapsulated message
00698     unsigned short sharecount; // num of messages MINUS ONE that have this message encapsulated.
00699                                // 0: not shared (not encapsulated or encapsulated in one message);
00700                                // 1: shared once (shared among two messages);
00701                                // 2: shared twice (shared among three messages); etc.
00702                                // on reaching max sharecount a new packet gets created
00703 
00704   public:
00705     // internal: sets the message duration; called by channel objects and sendDirect
00706     void setDuration(simtime_t d) {duration = d;}
00707 
00708     // internal: sets the isReceptionStart() flag
00709     void setReceptionStart(bool b) {setFlag(FL_ISRECEPTIONSTART, b);}
00710 
00711     // internal convenience method: returns the getId() of the innermost encapsulated message,
00712     // or itself if there is no encapsulated message
00713     long getEncapsulationId() const;
00714 
00715     // internal convenience method: returns getTreeId() of the innermost encapsulated message,
00716     // or itself if there is no encapsulated message
00717     long getEncapsulationTreeId() const;
00718 
00719     // internal: if encapmsg is shared (sharecount>0), creates a private copy for this packet,
00720     // and in any case it sets encapmsg's owner to be this object. This method
00721     // has to be called before any operation on encapmsg, to prevent trouble
00722     // that may arise from accessing shared message instances. E.g. without calling
00723     // _detachEncapMsg(), encapmsg's ownerp is unpredictable (may be any previous owner,
00724     // possibly not even existing any more) which makes even a call to its getFullPath()
00725     // method dangerous.
00726     void _detachEncapMsg();
00727 
00728     // internal: delete encapmsg, paying attention to its sharecount (assumes encapmsg!=NULL)
00729     void _deleteEncapMsg();
00730 
00731     // internal: only to be used by test cases
00732     int getShareCount() const {return sharecount;}
00733 
00734   public:
00740     cPacket(const cPacket& packet);
00741 
00746     explicit cPacket(const char *name=NULL, short kind=0, int64 bitLength=0);
00747 
00751     virtual ~cPacket();
00752 
00757     cPacket& operator=(const cPacket& packet);
00759 
00762 
00767     virtual cPacket *dup() const  {return new cPacket(*this);}
00768 
00773     virtual std::string info() const;
00774 
00779     virtual std::string detailedInfo() const;
00780 
00785     virtual void forEachChild(cVisitor *v);
00786 
00792     virtual void parsimPack(cCommBuffer *buffer);
00793 
00799     virtual void parsimUnpack(cCommBuffer *buffer);
00800 
00804     virtual bool isPacket() const {return true;}
00806 
00814     virtual void setBitLength(int64 l);
00815 
00821     void setByteLength(int64 l)  {setBitLength(l<<3);}
00822 
00833     virtual void addBitLength(int64 delta);
00834 
00841     void addByteLength(int64 delta)  {addBitLength(delta<<3);}
00842 
00846     virtual int64 getBitLength() const  {return len;}
00847 
00852     int64 getByteLength() const  {return (len+7)>>3;}
00853 
00857     virtual void setBitError(bool e) {setFlag(FL_BITERROR,e);}
00858 
00862     virtual bool hasBitError() const {return flags&FL_BITERROR;}
00864 
00867 
00881     virtual void encapsulate(cPacket *packet);
00882 
00890     virtual cPacket *decapsulate();
00891 
00899     virtual cPacket *getEncapsulatedPacket() const;
00900 
00905     _OPPDEPRECATED cPacket *getEncapsulatedMsg() const {return getEncapsulatedPacket();}
00907 
00916     simtime_t_cref getDuration() const {return duration;}
00917 
00926     bool isReceptionStart() const {return flags & FL_ISRECEPTIONSTART;}
00928 };
